content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting for a friend:
in a remote location was outside working.
caught attention because it was not behaving like a star.
thought it might be a satellite or plane but quickly realized it was not.
a light moving in a vaguely vertically circular path and repeatedly changing directions and speed and hovering occasionally.
excited that it was not something known or common to this area.
came to share the news and get it reported.
did not lose sight of the object.
going to see if it is still there now.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Lights observed moving randomly vertically circular and hovering at times and repeatedly changing direction

content.summary: Ufo seemed to be irratic getting close and moving away

content.detailedDescription: On dec 7 at 6:50 pm me and my two daughters were coming back from the store . as we parked in our complex and were unloading groceries from out trunk when we noticed strange lights in the sky. there were 4 points of lights square shaped directly  above us. the object was spinning in a circular pattern but always remained in 4 equally spaced square pattern. i looked around and tried to see if we saw any neighbors to ask what they thought but nobody was around. it was very still and very quiet and i felt sadness and very alone in that moment . my daughters and i age 9 and 11 were watching in awe trying to figure out what it was. at first i thought maybe the huge spot lights various car dealerships and clubs might use but there were no beams and it didn't appear at a angle it was directly above us. we did not see the lights as we pulled in and parked only when we got out almost as if it appeared specifically for us . it was large approximately the size of my building and it was kind of close seemed like. it switched angles maybe 20 degrees south but spinning circular square shaped still. it only lasted about 10 minutes not sure what place would run spot lights for only 10 minutes at 7 pm. couldn't rule it out other than it was ufo . i tried to take video n pictures. the video was blank and the pictures i took were extremely blurry but you can kind of tell there were 4 lights moving . my youngest daughter started to get scared so we went inside. i went back out on my porch n it had moved over to my right a bit for about 2 more minutes then it was gone. haven't seen anything anywhere close to it since.
content.summary: Was in the parking lot of my complex and there was 4 points of light in a square shape above  me.. i'm friends with ken gerhard and he told me to make a report here

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of turkey vultures at rattlesnake conservation area in milton, ontario, canada.
i noticed the ufo only after i've taken the pictures.
when i looked at the first picture i didn't know what to think about the perfectly round ball light (behind the vulture in flight).
but the second picture where the ball light changed of place (in front of the vulture in flight) and was now surrounded by a violet light make me ask if there is something more i see than a light distortion of my camera.
content.summary: I found a strong similarity with the case 63290 of the pictures i got and the fact that i've seen the ufo only after i've taken the pictures

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from nj where i was visiting my relatives.  my 20th month old son was with me.  on the night of march 14 i turned onto galloway road from byberry street where i saw a pulsating, blinking object from the west which appeared stationary from where we were.  since we live in an area with three airports (phili, west trenton and another small prop job airport whose name i am blanking on) i initially assumed it was an aircraft.  however, several things dispelled this view.  1) it started to descend whereas a plane from any of the three airports would be ascending in this direction (west to east) 2) it seemed, even from a distance, to be a huge aircraft larger than any of the smaller jets and planes flying in and out of west trenton and the small prop job airport. 3) no other planes were sighted in this particular area at the time   

i continued to observe the object as i stopped at the red light at galloway.  it definitely remained stationary for about half a minute before moving in a downward descent east.  as the light turned green i continued to look at it as i drove and the object descended so low that i could make out three things (in the course of about 10 seconds)

1) a light shining underneath it

2) fan like indentations

3) a window like hole in the middle of the object

the object was definitely triangular in shape.  i kept looking for wings, such as an airplane would have, that i never found.  at this point there was a mixture of fear and awe over the possibility that this was a ufo.

the object continued to descend east until i lost sight of it among the buildings on hulmeville road (which intersects galloway).

i must admit before i end my report that i am avidly interested in ufos and ufology and have been since i was a teenager.  i even watched mufon's special on the history channel.  i am always looking up the stars to see if there is any unusual activity and for the past 25 or so years i have never witnessed any.  this is the only time when i have seen an object that i could not identify as aircraft of some kind.  had my son not been in the car with me (whose safety is my first priority) i would have attempted to follow the craft further.  after several weeks i am still in awe about the incident.
content.summary: Saw a pulsating, blinking ufo whose undercarriage revealed it to be triangle in shape with window hole in middle

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching phillies pre game when they panned up to see the skydivers dropping the first ball. i noticed something shoot across the sky.
you can see it clearly on the video. in the video you will see the smoke trail from the skydiver and a small disc fly from top right of screen behind the smoke and then change direction and shoot straight up leaving a weird circular trail behind it. i can not upload the video for some reason... however if you would like me to send it to you please email me. i can send photos of the video but not the actual video. this is a compelling video with great clarity.
content.summary: Moved very fast..Changed direction and left a circular trail

content.detailedDescription:
Eran las 1:38 am del día viernes 07 de noviembre de 2014 cuando divisé una luz blanca-violeta muy intensa que que contorneaba las nubes , pensé que podría ser un reflector potente que apuntaba hacia arriba , cuando de repente, en un claro de nubes , se dejó ver dicha "nave" , pude seguirla con la vista unos 15 segundos hasta que desapareció entre las mismas ...; logré comparar dicho artefacto con el tamaño de un avión en circunstancias similares y llegué a la conclusión  de que esta nave era "mucho"mas grande que cualquier avión ; de hecho , no existe comparación .
 yo estaba en la azotea del edificio en donde vivo con mi familia , pero recalco que este edificio solo cuenta con dos pisos + planta baja (es un edificio pequeño) . en esos momentos estaba relajándome , cuando presencié al objeto , podría decirse que se crisparon los bellos de todo el cuerpo , me sentí y actualmente me siento impresionado , y a la vez ,"afortunado".
 adquirí el conocimiento de la existencia de la organización mufon gracias al seguimiento que realizo del dr. steven greer y toda su campaña , este reporte llegó un poco tarde ..., pero llegó (mas vale tarde que nunca ) . investigando un largo rato  "dí " con un testimonio similar ocurrido en daubenberger road en turlock, california creo que el 07/1/2015 ; los detalles son similares, como así el bosquejo dibujado a mano del objeto. creo que tengo que recalcar algo : el tamaño de la nave es engañoso a simple vista , dado que , para quien pueda verla , o divisarla , pareciera que vuela bajo , pero lo que en realidad sucede  es que el "tamaño " del objeto confunde a quien puede verlo..., es "gigante".
content.summary: Forma de boomerang , gigante , majestuoso , aproximadamente 200-250 m de longitud , 100% silencioso, increíble

content.detailedDescription:
Myself my farther and my sister were walking home from a fishing trip along a old disused railway line approximately half way home my farther first noticed some sort of craft in the sky i remember him saying "look at that wonder what that is " as we approached the craft from a distance of around 100 mtrs again i remember my farther saying " its not a plane as planes can't hover & it can't be a helicopter as there's no noise coming from it " we got to the point were we was directly underneath the craft it was clearly a disk shaped craft & was deadly silent it was approximately 15 to 30 mtrs in diameter & had a range of lights on the under carriage from what i can recall there were three or four layers of red green and blue lights under the craft , we had a camera for taking pictures of fish but when we tried to take a picture from underneath the craft we found the batteries in the camera were dead we must of stayed staring in aww of the craft for around 10 minutes before we continued our walk home the craft didn't move for some time as we kept looking back in total shock questioning what we just seen then in the blink
of a eye we looked back and it had vanished we did not see it leave it was just gone since that day i have noticed i affect electrical and electronic equipment and often wonder if it is something to do with being so close to the craft
content.summary: Myself & my farther & sister witnessed a disk shape craft silently hovering about 30 feet in the air it had lights on the underside & just hovered above are heads for some time before it disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were returning from boardman ohio to liberty township on 4-5-2015 and we were commenting on the strange shapes of the clouds that evening.(we never saw clouds that shape before) my wife was insistent on taking pictures of the clouds when we got home,(591 santa monica circle, youngstown ,ohio 44505)she took 2 pictures from different positions at our driveway. after the pictures were taken my wife was showing them to me and pointed out the strange orb in both pictures. it was not visible to the naked eye and was noticed only after photos were seen. i don't know what it is other than it is unidentified, it is in the sky (flying) and it is an object. any input from you will be appreciated. 

                                           [item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: Unusual cloud formations, pictures taken of clouds ufo caught in picture

content.detailedDescription:
It was friday, april 4th, 1969, just a few days before easter. my pal, charlie, and i - two very bored soldiers - were setting out on a hitchhiking expedition from fort bragg, north carolina to myrtle beach, south carolina with vague hopes of scoring with some partying college coeds taking their spring break in the popular seaside town. leaving the base with our backpacks and sleeping bags at about sunset we headed south out of fayetteville on interstate 95.

reaching the large rest stop, south of the border, a few hours later, we stopped at a coffee shop to grab a cup and get our bearings before continuing on.  sob, as the soldiers called it, was located just across the border in south carolina outside the town of dillon.  while drinking our coffees and looking over our map we couldn't help but notice a rather loud group of local rowdies, talking [item moved/cms/nd] and throwing dirty looks our way. this was the way it was during the rambunctious 1960s. in the area of the south we were in it could be dangerous for hitchhiking strangers, especially blacks, hippies, yankees and soldiers. accordingly, charlie and i took the leering snarls very seriously, finishing up quickly and moving on down the road. 

soon, we were walking through downtown dillon toward route 25, the old latta highway cutoff toward myrtle beach, still 70 miles away. one good ride would get us there and at the same time get us away from the trouble we both sensed. and sure enough, it wasn't all that long before two cars showed up with our friends from the coffee shop on board, hootin' and hollerin' as they went by. as empty as the town was at this time of night (nearly 10 pm) it didn't bother us too much because of the street lights and the occasional traffic on the road. but, as we reached the edge of town near the cutoff - with the rowdies going by every few minutes and the chances of a ride looking increasingly doubtful - the two of us began looking for an escape hatch. after the loudmouths passed by us again and drove out of sight we took the opportunity to slip off the road into a dimly lit area behind a vacant, broken-down gas station. walking by the left side of the deserted building we followed a wheel-rutted dirt path up and over a small crest, by now barely able to see more than a few feet in front of us as we passed by trees on the edge of the gas station lot into almost complete darkness. 

but, as the two of us picked our way carefully down the car path, the whole area suddenly lit up in an aqua-green glow showing a small field no more than a few acres in size. now i could see clearly, and what i saw amazed me; there was a three- or four-story high, multi-decked ufo standing on what seemed to be metal legs. in addition, there were beings similar to humans - a head with two eyes, two arms and upright on two legs - but colored green, either an effect of the ambient light or the result of my extreme confusion and fear. they were walking in the field and on decks which curved around the ship, with the nearest one about 20 feet away. he/she/it turned our way, and said firmly (i believe telepathically) "leave! now!"

in spite of the danger that had caused us leave the highway in the first place, both charlie and myself, like the trained soldiers we were, executed a smart about-face and marched right back toward trouble. we hiked at a pretty quick route step down the road a few miles without saying a word to, or looking at, each other, hoofing just as fast as we could out of dillon into some farming and pasturage area.

presently, the rowdies showed up once more in their cars, making it clear we were their targets for this night. once again, as the cars went out of sight we left the highway, into a cow pasture this time. from a spot a few hundred yards off the road we watched them as they returned looking for us. eventually, the night settled down the cars were gone and we climbed into our sleeping bags.

the next morning we continued on to myrtle beach.

here's the best part. as far as i can recall we had forgotten about the ufo.

one day, thirty years later my buddy called up from out of the blue and asked me, "do you remember dillon?" i had no idea what he was talking about. but as soon as he said, "the ufo," the whole experience came back in a flash.
content.summary: Myself and one other person saw a spacecraft and humanoids on the ground.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
So i was biking, and at this point i had seen many things happen, one space ship i thought was a shooting star but then it looked too low and it was a disk on fire after mid flight,, and it left a trail of smoke i could see by the moon light,

but this one i'm most concerned with is this,
i was biking home and i already know that some of the constellations are just bases so as i was looking down i wanted them to make a show for the people watching the sky, and as soon as i looked up and found a star (biking riding) it flickered with a light that came out of no where and dissapeared at the same time a new light, just as bright as the old "star" probably a few thousand feet away, the whole motion if i connected the dots made a triangle,,

i've seen so much, i am waiting for contact so i can make a cheesy 80's type film, but then make a dazzling one as well...

i'm just sick of the cosmic politics, 
and i want the constellations to be a gateway for agriculture and travel, not science or whatever [item moved/cms/nd]

it would be nice to talk to some one, but
i've found out the constellations can work with my thoughts and the city lights (city stars) aren't stars,, 

the city lights should be for helping not watching,,, the cia keeps hanging up on me lol
content.summary: I can work with beings to put on light shows for those watching the stars, sometimes, with big constellations

content.detailedDescription: Since 2013 over been watching different objects in the sky. being disabled.I don't  get around much,because of disability . i sat on back  patio, relaxing and then i saw a image huge head. with no fear i blew it a kiss . exmarine no fear. ! amazed  at the sighing. i said to myself ,imagining things,well it is what it is . a couple days later , it all started in full swing.A lonley being came to me, a circle of ligths ,about 5 to 10 miles away. it got closer  and closer and  said to myself ,this can't be happening .(fred keep  it chedder) the object  came within 20 yards of me and stopped. i looked away and rubbed  my eyes,still there. i had no fear of this being  but a loving feeling, why i'm not such. then it slowly moved away. time and time again i tried to say maybe the ligth from the sun or clouds sigthing after sigthing . until i started taking  pictures  of my friends . i have the first shots on my phone.Well i'm running out of space to be continue d.Don't know how to use photo section.Not good at this.
content.summary: While on back patio, while sitting in chair, talking to my mother. to my rigth a beautiful image appeared. i said to my mother look at that,she did in amazement. former school teacher, the size of the being huge. head turned closer towards us, wow!

content.detailedDescription:
Observer: one male adult pedestrian
location of observation: drove road (near magic roundabout intersection), swindon, wiltshire, sn1, uk 
visibility: very good. 
ambient light: just after dusk. streetlights in the area. 

description: a triangular craft was seen floating above the quiet residential area immediately to the east of drove road swindon for a short period of time before moving away, in a manner inconsistent with a sighting of any conventional craft. 

the craft was seen to be floating perfectly still and in complete silence very close to drove road at a low altitude above houses. it is difficult to estimate the altitude of the craft but it was perhaps 50-70ft from the ground, and certainly what would legally constitute ‘low flying’. the craft was very close to the observer and so it could be seen with great clarity. it was very conspicuous and easy to observe. it was clearly not any form of conventional aircraft or any other known object. 
the planform of the craft was a perfect triangle in shape and was larger in area than any one of the houses over which it loitered although it did not appear as large in area as two such houses. at each of the vertices of the visible underside were very large, powerful circular lights (one at each vertex). the character of the light was very similar to that of the surrounding street lights. i.E. a bright flame yellow hue. there was a subtle difference of colour between the light and that of the street lights. namely, it was of a slightly more brilliant character: less burnt and slightly more saturated. 

the craft itself was of a dark or black colour and with no noticeable surface features. it was not possible to make out the texture of the surface. there were no signs of landing gear or wheels or indeed any other protrusions. the triangle was perhaps a bit broader in the axis of motion. at the centre of the underside, seemingly fixed directly to the bottom of the craft, was a pulsing red light far smaller than the others. this appeared to be very similar in character and frequency if not identical to a standard red anti-collision beacon of the sort used commonly in aviation. the craft loitered perfectly still without any movement or instability and in complete silence over a quiet residential area for an observed period of approximately 3-4 minutes although it was already in-situ when first sighted and so may have been there for a while. it could not have been present for more than 15-20 min as the area was traversed in the opposite direction using the same route approximately this length of time prior to the start of the observation window. it was obvious during the observation that the area immediately underneath the craft must have been very brightly illuminated by the powerful lights. anyone beneath the craft would have been dazzled/blinded. the planform seemed to be entirely parallel to the ground while it was stationary. 

after about 3-4 minutes, it moved off without any noticeable acceleration. it moved very slowly – perhaps no more than 15mph based on comparisons with moving traffic on drove road. interestingly, it moved with one of the vertices leading, as though that were the nose of the craft. no fins or signs of a tail could be seen. it remained horizontal as it moved away and no instabilities/roll/etc. were visible. almost immediately after beginning to move, the large lights were all switched off. the lights continued to glow and hence remained visible for the duration of the 30-40 seconds it took for the craft to attain diminished visibility to the observer. the afterglow was very distinctive and allowed the craft to remain visible for much longer than would otherwise have been the case. perhaps a qualified lighting expert might be able to identify the type of light involved: the glow was a burnt dim orange-yellow hue and faded very slowly. this also gave the impression that the lights were more powerful than had originally been thought. slight concentric grooves were apparent within the lights as with powerful search lights and floodlights perhaps.  
the craft was moving in a straight line of constant altitude towards the portion of queen’s drive near to the magic roundabout. however, before reaching that position the craft banked to the right at a very steep angle (nearly vertical) giving an excellent view of the craft from below, something that would not be seen in conventional aviation.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Triangular craft seen near magic roundabout intersection

content.detailedDescription: Trouble. the airforce had it on radar until it flew under radar.The sand was about 20ft in the circle.I have kept my mouth shut all these years.Because the was a classified area my father said since it landed on sand it would disapper in a few days.The airforce at white sands is a classified area to this day.My father was there for several sightings. that's all i can say about it.Thank you.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 6 pm me and my friend were looking out my living room window and saw some triangular objects in the sky that were moving fast and flashing orange and green. they stayed there a while but then about around 100 had turned up. sphere ones aswell. they were everywhere above the trees in peoples gardens. we were in shock!!! i noticed in the distance there were tall orange and red hollograms it looked like they were doing something to the field. we then noticed the moon had like a red and blue tinge around it and they objects kept moving back to it. we watched this for a while. i later found out that bp powerstation had been put on red allert there was objects flying around my friend took some pics this was a black object with green lights.. and the fighter jets were out!! i paniked and me and my friend ran next door to my neighbors to warn her. i then told her to look over in the gardens trees and fields. she also saw this. i later seen a lizard type thing slowly dragging itself into the bushes straight across from my house. my friend also saw a dark shadowed figure with long arms and skinny legs. then we both saw this machine type thing that looked like it grew and was taller than the trees it looked quite scary. i called the police as we were very hysterical. they eventualy turned up 2 hours later and werent much help. they didnt even know about the power plant having a red warning. all the orange flashing like triangles would get bigger and smaller then by 6 this morning it went foggy and they were gone
content.summary: Over 100 ufos in the sky and landimg all different kinds

content.detailedDescription:
I worked a twelve hour shift at a plastic manufacturing company. it was winter...........Around january is my guess. i often stopped at my girlfriends house when i got off work at seven pm and then i would drive home, so i figure i got home around 8:45 ish. 

i lived with my cousin and his wife. the house faced a four laned street and it had a horseshoe drive way. meaning that the driveway went all the way around the house and there were two ways of getting in and out of the yard. i pulled into the driveway and drove around to the back of the house and backed my car into the grass. this meant that i was parked facing the back of the house and i could see across the street. i noticed an object but i didn't pay much mind to it, figuring that i'd identify it when i got out of the car. i grabbed my lunch box and exited the vehicle. i looked at this object and waited for my brain to interpret and process what my eyes were seeing but my brain never did. i took a few steps away from my car and i stopped. by now i am probably about thirty feet from the object. i looked and i remember i kept whispering, "what is that?" to myself over and over. i was both afraid, and intrigued. i was completely focused on the object at this point. 

it hovered about six inches from the ground and was about three feet tall. it was egg-shaped (like a blob) and appeared to be organic in nature.............I didn't get that it was a vessel of any kind. it's "skin" (for lack of a better term) seemed to move.........Or travel around it's body. it had hundreds of pores........And the pores gave off light reminiscent of lightening bugs.........But lightening bugs are greenish in color.........The color of the lights on this was closer to copper. the lights/pores moved around the entirety of the object in a fluidic.........Organic.....And as far as i could tell, random fashion. the motion of the lights/pores was not aggressive........It was graceful.........But it was completely dynamic: every light/pore seemed to be apt to travel to any and every part of it's body in time. it just hovered there...........It maintained it's basic egg/oval shape but it kept changing a little from top to bottom with the same randomness as the lights.    

i stood there stunned.......Still whispering, "what is that?" i was afraid but again, i was also intrigued and so i began to walk toward the street closer to it and as if noticing me it began to float up. it floated up at the approximate speed of a balloon filled with helium. it went up about fifteen feet and then went to the right and then ascending farther up and back over the house across the street and ended up about thirty feet high or so. it was within the silhouette of a tree........As if it were trying to get to cover. there were no leaves on the tree and of course, it had all of these little lights shining through it's pores so it could still be seen. 

i was completely amazed. my cousins both worked the graveyard shift and they didn't wake up until around 9:30 pm or so, but i woke them up early. i apologized for waking them up but i told them that they had to come outside to see this thing. i pointed at it and asked them what they thought it was. they didn't know. i then went on to tell them what had happened. they weren't quite as amazed as i was but that thing clearly was not of this earth..........And if it was, then it wasn't anything even remotely close to any being i had ever heard of. 

it was cold out so i didn't stay out there long, but i could look out of my bedroom window and i could still see it in the same spot. i went to the window two or three times and it was still there. i went a final time a little after midnight before i went to sleep and it was still there. when i woke up the next morning, it was gone. this was 1988 and so there were no camera phones or any way to photograph it. to this day i regret that i didn't bundle up and stay out there with it. i regret that i didn't call the police and put it on record. i was tired, cold and sleepy and i didn't want anyone to think i was crazy.........So i went to bed. it was the most fascinating thing i'd ever seen and have ever seen since............And i went to bed. 

to this day, i have never heard an encounter even slightly similar to my own but i never really dug that deep into it. i would be beyond appreciative if you know of any stories similar to this. i'd like to know that i'm not the only one that witnessed this.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I witnessed an alien being hover six inches above ground and then it ascended into a tree top.

content.detailedDescription:
This report may or may not be ufo related. we don't know for sure.
it is a report of missing time that affected both our watches and also the car clock. 3 different time pieces and all for the same amount of time.
 it happened in the state of michigan on 14 aug 2013, my wife and i were traveling north on i-75 between 2:30 and 3:00 am. our trip was uneventful until we passed the town of grayling michigan. 
 we stopped at a gas station there and or watches were correct with a clock at the station.
 somewhere between grayling and mackinaw city we were feeling tired and stopped at what looked like a closed rest stop that was on the right (east side) of the highway. we are not sure if we napped or not and thought it was for a short period, then continued north and did not stop until we arrived in mackinaw city. 
 at that time of the morning it was a difficult time trying to find a hotel to check into. we looked at our watches and both noticed we were 22 minutes less than the time in mackinaw. the digital car clock was also 22 minutes behind. we just thought this was very strange and have no explanation for it. we did find a room and our time pieces have not had any time losses since that incident. we just wondered if you may be interested in this report in case anything happened around the same time to someone else.

if you think this report has nothing to do with ufo activity we are sorry for any trouble we may have caused you and therefore just disregard it.

thank you
content.summary: Wife and i both lost 22 minutes traveling north between grayling & mackinaw

content.detailedDescription:
I was 21 years old at the time and was staying with my mom and dad in coloma, wi that weekend and was going to work in port edwards heading north on hwy 51 (now interstate 39).  it was the 4th of july and was working 3rd shift that week so it was dusk (about 9:00pm?!?), likely 1988 but could possibly be 1987.  if its important i could find out the specific year.

as i was heading north on 51, 1 mile i saw what looked like a glowing red/orange orb behind a bridge abutment that crossed the hwy(believe it was the first bridge that crossed the highway north of coloma); it looked like a setting sun and shimmed and glowed.  thinking it was a reflection of some type, i moved head back and forth and lowered and raised my head/shoulders trying to determine if it was in fact a reflection or ?!?!?.  however it did not move and was stationary on the far side of the bridge.

i still did not know what it was.  i was young and didn't know that ufo's came in a form different than a classic flying saucer... i was confused and didn't know what i was looking at.  i didn't watch for more than 4-5 seconds when it began to rise above the bridge and moved from the back side of the bridge to the front where i could see that it was an entire round orb, and could better make out that it was like a fireball, shimmering and glowing you could see what looked like heat waves coming off on it.  it was not on the ground but was taller than the bridge in total... maybe 8-10 feet off the ground and 15-20 feet above the top of the bridge.  still could not believe what i was seeing so i moved my whole body in large motions as far to the passenger seat as i could... up and down.  i was confused and it didn't make sense.  its hard to remember what happened next as i was still wondering what it could possibly be when it just seemed to disintegrate... it just seemed to disappear in a short period.  not "on and off" abruptly but a quick fad/disintegration.

i was not exactly scared but felt very uneasy and didn't want to keep driving in that direction but had to get to work so kept driving.  i didn't see anything strange when i got to the bridge but i didn't really look much either and sped by as quickly as my little car could take me.  i don't remember other cars coming in the opposite direction or much of anything else until my next turnoff maybe.  it really bothered me and felt shaken  trying to think what it could possibly be.  it was the forth of july and did see small fireworks in the sky afterwords maybe a few miles past the bridge... before my turnoff at hancock.  what i saw could not be a firework. 

i was pretty far away from the bridge when i observed it yet the object was still very noticeable and large.  the bridge appeared very small to give you an idea of how far i was away yet i could very easily see the object.  also, despite being dusk, the object was not really bright... not translucent, solid but not bright... more shimming and why i guessed that it was a reflection at first.

didn't tell anyone at work that night or even at home the next morning.  i still had a hard time explaining what i saw and was very unsure of myself.  it wasn't until very many years later when i learned that a ufo/et craft could be some thing other than a metallic disk.

its been many years and not meaningful in anyway but wanted to finally tell this story.
content.summary: Fireball like orb that appeared behind a bridge abutment, raised up and over was stationary then moved a bit to the east and disintegrated

content.detailedDescription:
It was the morning of april 4 2015 at about 0600; or right before the sun rose above the mountains in the distance.

psychedelic use was involved so let that be known. that said i have had a lot of experience with psychedelic medicines and i had taken a very low dose and was not in a state where i would see objects that weren't there.

this was the shortly after the lunar eclipse had maximized. i was waiting for sky spirits to come and was actively asking them to visit us (my brother an i).

first i see a light that's blinking. about the size of a light of a plane that you would see. this light is the only light that appeared for hours in the sky. at first its far away then i comes straight towards us and eventually goes overhead and past us towards the direction of where the sun rises. 

as it was overhead we were also watching the lunar eclipse which was in the opposite direction of sunrise. before it past us i witnessed a shooting star as well. so it passes us and goes far into the distance toward mountains in the direction where the sun rises.

later we see another light coming from a different direction. it starts off going towards lake elsinore; going along the "mountain chain" that we were atop. then as i'm talking about sky spirits and joking with my brother that it might be one, it begins to turn abruptly and then goes off in a completely different direction (towards the mountains in the direction in which the sun rises)

we continue to watch this blinking light. then i start to noticed a weird electronic interference in the music we're listening to on my phone. as this is occurring i see another light start to blink in and out in the direction where the previously mention light was going. note: at this point the light is miles away.

then out of nowhere i hear the loud wind sound of something passing by overhead. when i look up i see a bright orb of light moving before me. still at least around a mile away and note we are on top of a mountain so it's hundreds of feet above us and we're already hundreds of feet above temecula valley. 

so as i'm watching this light i feel a spiritual and emotional connection to the light. i mention to my brother if it was a sky spirit why should it have to prove itself to us? if it was one i could only imagine that it would find it ridiculous and disrespectful for a human to demand it to prove itself that it is itself. 

anyways as i'm saying this, and we're watching the light, and i'm feeling connected to the being, my phone changes the song randomly to a remix i had created with a talk by chief golden light eagle / standing elk about the key to happiness. 

i was in awe. i felt connected to the spirit, and i believe it changed the song to remind us and help us how to live a better life. as the song is playing the light is moving in arcs before us (albeit at least 1-5 miles away) watching us. nearly as soon as the song ends the light begins to fade away and head off into the sunrise.

i should note a couple of things. this object had a strange trail; almost like a comet. also i should note that the other two blinking lights we witnessed had since disappeared as we had stopped watching them as the other light was much closer and demanded our attention. 

another thing of note is that my brother witnessed all of this as well, but the last objection we saw he witnessed as a dark sphere with a strange trail/tail. so we both witnessed some kind of strange flying objection; however i witnessed a sphere of white/yellow light and he witnessed a dark orb. 

another thing i would like to note is that we have witnessed strange things like this a handful of times atop said mountain during other astronomical events such as meteor showers, full moons, etc.

lastly i should note that while we were under the influence of 2g psilocybin mushrooms; i don't feel that that discounts what we saw. anyone who has experience with psychedelics will tell you that 2g of mushrooms does not occur hallucinations; it causes visual distortions. i should note that i am quite experienced with said medicines and i was in a very mild state of the medicine. 

my theory on psychedelics and ufo/spirit contact is that it opens you up to them. on top of that psychedelics seem to raise your energy/aura so to me it makes sense that it would cause us to be almost like flares that signal the sky spirits; especially considering we were on top of a mountain during the full moon during a total lunar eclipse.

that's all for now. all i know is that if you want to have an experience like this climb to the peak of one of the mountains in the temecula valley area (especially those that border the santa rosa plateau) during an astronomical event (full moon, new moon, meteor showers, etc) and if you're not against psychedelic use take a little bit of mushrooms or something and wait all night and you may witness something.
content.summary: Witnessed a light in the sky that moved back and forth before as i was atop a mountain

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting on back porch with three others.
2. my friend noticed something strange in the sky (rings around the moon or something of the sort) then after half an hour they look at the sky and said "look, a plane" (which was really the ufo), causing us to look up and witness the event.
3. a spaceship, there was no way a human could've made it.
4. it was a perfect black-dark grey circle. it flew west to east over the moon, covering all of it when it did. my friend with better eyesight said that the detailing made it so that it couldn't have been man made. it was closer to us than the moon, probably about the size of a football field. while flying in front of the moon, the clouds all parted for it, and they rippled away into the darkness. after it flew past the moon and into the dark night, we couldn't see the ufo anymore. then, the sky briefly lit up in a colourful flash, a bit like lightning, but we knew it wasn't. it was the ufo. this occurred in about 5-6 seconds.
5. we were all in shock, said 'what the f**k was that' and by the looks on each others faces, we all knew no one was lying and that we all saw it. everyone has the same story.
6. it was too dark to see in the dark night sky.
content.summary: Too dark to see w/o moon. flew over the moon, covering it, and parted the clouds that were over moon, creating a ripple affect. w/o stopping, continued in straight line over moon, then disappeared in darkness. the sky lit up in bluish colour afterwards.

content.detailedDescription: i was bringing out my telescope to look at some stars later when it got dark and as i was setting up and looking for stars and at the corner of my eye i saw something bright and moving. i called everyone out of the house to come look at it. it was brighter than a star and something i had never seen in my entire life.It looked kinda fuzzy looking and was pointed down but did not go down it just went straight and didn't go down.There were no lights,no wings like a plane should have,and no sound when a plane passes by that low it should make a heck of a lot of noise but no noise.My fellings were because i even believed in ufo's before and i now i belive in them more.I lost sight because it just disapeerd when it went behind my neighbors palm trees.
content.summary: It looked like it was going down but went straight

content.detailedDescription:
Walking dog before going to sleep. 11:15pm april 4 i saw an object with an orange light in front. it appeared to be at about 1,000 feet heading about 195 degrees.  it did not have aircraft navigation lights only an orange light in front. it made no sound at all as it passed overhead and once it was slightly past me i could no longer see the light. i was not able to determine  the  shape. 

it was a clear night and as a private pilot i quickly noticed that it didn't have navigation lights. the only light was orange at the front also not on aircraft. i tried to figure out was it could be and i don't have an answer. as it passed i could no longer see the orange light so that indicated to me that the light was at the front. 
i wondered if it was higher and bigger or lower and smaller. without clouds i can't be certain. it appeared to be smaller and at 1000 feet.  even a small aircraft at this altitude would have made a sound and there was none. i also wondered if someone was playing a trick with a glow stick on a helium balloon. however it didn't rise and there was no wind at all to cause it to move.
content.summary: 11:15pm april 4 i saw an object with an orangeorange light in front

content.detailedDescription: My daughter asia had some calzones at famous pizza on broadway & bayaud denver co we parked 2 blocks east of broadway 1 block south my car door on passenger side is broke we left restaurant at 8:35 at the car at 8:40 as i was trying to unlock door my daughter says dad what is that i immediately look at her and she is looking west i look the way she was and i see at least 5-8 lights travelling in a straight line not single file but staggered as i am pointing up i noticed no more than at least 65 more lights all going in the same flight pattern at about 500 ft no more cause a helicopter was  a couple of thousand ft to the north these lights were the size of a mid -size car  orange in color no emissions no sound out of about  20 people are around and only my daughter and i looked up nobody else would look as i am trying to get someone to look and all the sheep do what they do best my daughter tried to get pictures but they were to far west for the cellphone camera as we are looking at this event unfold my daughter started to get scared i was excited due to the fact she was witnessed this with me this started at about 8:37 and we look at the phone when we seen the last one at 8:52 as they were travelling south we lost sight due to tree obstruction however at about 5 minutes into watching a passenger plane was flying at approximately 15-17 thousand ft and climbing to get to altitude going west.
content.summary: 20 - 75 round car size going south
